score: 1 out of 1 people found the following review useful
review: Pretty good movie.  Not too great, not too horrible.  Had some nice twists, but the whole graveyard death thing wasn't to smart.  I'm not a big fan of those.  I enjoyed this movie a lot, and recommend it to anyone who has enjoyed the first.  Its not better, but its good.
